user.title: My account
user.intro: Manage your local account, backups, and security settings.

userId.title: User ID
userId.desc: Your unique identifier on this device.

backup.title: Backup
backup.desc: Choose a save location, set and confirm a backup PIN, then store the file safely. You can restore it later via the import/restore option.

changePin.title: Change PIN
changePin.desc: Set a new PIN for this user on this device.

resetKeys.title: Reset security keys
resetKeys.desc: Generates new keys used to encrypt your messages and clears chat history.

delete.title: Delete user
delete.desc: Remove this user and all local data.
